mapper.select: SELECT STATIS_DATE , SCH_AREA_NAME, CNTY_NAME , SCH_ID , SCH_NAME, SCH_PART_ID, SCH_PART_NAME, ADD_CMCC_D, ADD_SHARE_CMCC_D, ADD_CMCC_M, ADD_CUCC_M, ADD_CTCC_M, ADD_SHARE_CMCC_M, RANK_ADD_CMCC_M, ADD_CMCC_AFTER0801, ADD_CUCC_AFTER0801, ADD_CTCC_AFTER0801, ADD_SHARE_CMCC_AFTER0801, RANK_ADD_CMCC_AFTER0801, CALL_CMCC, CALL_CUCC, CALL_CTCC, CALL_SHARE_CMCC, CALL_RANK_CMCC, CALL_SHARE_CUCC, CALL_SHARE_CTCC, COMMUNI_CMCC, COMMUNI_CUCC, COMMUNI_CTCC, COMMUNI_SHARE_CMCC, COMMUNI_RANK_CMCC, COMMUNI_SHARE_CUCC, COMMUNI_SHARE_CTCC, G4_CMCC_D, G4_CMCC_M, G4_CMCC, G4_RATE, G4_RANK, UMLIMIT_CMCC_D, UMLIMIT_CMCC_M, UNLIMIT_CMCC, UNLIMIT_RATE, UNLIMIT_RANK, UNLIMIT_DIEJIA, ARPU, ARPU_HB, DOU, DOU_HB, MOU, MOU_HB, VNET, VNET_RATE, CHARGE, CHARGE_RATE, KD_CMCC_D, KD_CMCC_M, KD_CMCC, KD_RATE, CONTRACT_CMCC, CONTRACT_PHONE_CMCC, CONTRACT_KD_CMCC, CONTRACT_OTHER_CMCC, CONTRACT_CMCC_TOL, HY_RATE FROM BONC02.RP_SALE_LABEL_D_TOL WHERE STATIS_DATE =#{statisMonth} AND TYPE = 1
SELECT city_name, sch_id, sch_name, LEVEL_NAME, SCH_PART_ID, SCH_PART_NAME, lac_cell_id , cell_name , Life_cyc_stats FROM BONC02.DIM_COLLEGE_SCH_LAC_CELL_INFO_M

SELECT STATIS_DATE , SCH_AREA_NAME, CNTY_NAME , ADD_CMCC_D, ADD_SHARE_CMCC_D, ADD_CMCC_M, ADD_CUCC_M, ADD_CTCC_M, ADD_SHARE_CMCC_M, RANK_ADD_CMCC_M, ADD_CMCC_AFTER0801, ADD_CUCC_AFTER0801, ADD_CTCC_AFTER0801, ADD_SHARE_CMCC_AFTER0801, RANK_ADD_CMCC_AFTER0801, CALL_CMCC, CALL_CUCC, CALL_CTCC, CALL_SHARE_CMCC, CALL_RANK_CMCC, CALL_SHARE_CUCC, CALL_SHARE_CTCC, COMMUNI_CMCC, COMMUNI_CUCC, COMMUNI_CTCC, COMMUNI_SHARE_CMCC, COMMUNI_RANK_CMCC, COMMUNI_SHARE_CUCC, COMMUNI_SHARE_CTCC, G4_CMCC_D, G4_CMCC_M, G4_CMCC, G4_RATE, G4_RANK, UMLIMIT_CMCC_D, UMLIMIT_CMCC_M, UNLIMIT_CMCC, UNLIMIT_RATE, UNLIMIT_RANK, UNLIMIT_DIEJIA, ARPU, ARPU_HB, DOU, DOU_HB, MOU, MOU_HB, VNET, VNET_RATE, CHARGE, CHARGE_RATE, KD_CMCC_D, KD_CMCC_M, KD_CMCC, KD_RATE, CONTRACT_CMCC, CONTRACT_PHONE_CMCC, CONTRACT_KD_CMCC, CONTRACT_OTHER_CMCC, CONTRACT_CMCC_TOL, HY_RATE FROM BONC02.RP_SALE_LABEL_D_TOL WHERE STATIS_DATE = #{statisMonth} AND TYPE = 2

SELECT STATIS_MONTH, SCH_AREA_NAME, CNTY_NAME, ADD_CMCC_M, ADD_CUCC_M, ADD_CTCC_M, ADD_SHARE_CMCC_M, RANK_ADD_CMCC_M, ADD_CMCC_AFTER0801, ADD_CUCC_AFTER0801, ADD_CTCC_AFTER0801, ADD_SHARE_CMCC_AFTER0801, RANK_ADD_CMCC_AFTER0801, CALL_CMCC, CALL_CUCC, CALL_CTCC, CALL_SHARE_CMCC, CALL_RANK_CMCC, CALL_SHARE_CUCC, CALL_SHARE_CTCC, COMMUNI_CMCC, COMMUNI_CUCC, COMMUNI_CTCC, COMMUNI_SHARE_CMCC, COMMUNI_RANK_CMCC, COMMUNI_SHARE_CUCC, COMMUNI_SHARE_CTCC, G4_CMCC_M, G4_CMCC, G4_RATE, G4_RANK, UMLIMIT_CMCC_M, UNLIMIT_CMCC, UNLIMIT_RATE, UNLIMIT_RANK, UNLIMIT_DIEJIA, ARPU, ARPU_TWO_MONTH, ARPU_MEAN, MOU, MOU_TWO_MONTH, MOU_MEAN, DOU, DOU_TWO_MONTH, DOU_MEAN, VNET, VNET_RATE, CHARGE, CHARGE_RATE, KD_CMCC_M, KD_CMCC, KD_RATE, CONTRACT_CMCC, CONTRACT_PHONE_CMCC, CONTRACT_KD_CMCC, CONTRACT_OTHER_CMCC, CONTRACT_CMCC_TOL, HY_RATE FROM BONC02.RP_SALE_LABEL_M_TOL WHERE STATIS_MONTH = #{statisMonth} AND TYPE = 5

SELECT STATIS_MONTH, SCH_AREA_NAME, CNTY_NAME, SCH_ID, SCH_NAME, SCH_PART_ID, SCH_PART_NAME, ADD_CMCC_M, ADD_CUCC_M, ADD_CTCC_M, ADD_SHARE_CMCC_M, RANK_ADD_CMCC_M, ADD_CMCC_AFTER0801, ADD_CUCC_AFTER0801, ADD_CTCC_AFTER0801, ADD_SHARE_CMCC_AFTER0801, RANK_ADD_CMCC_AFTER0801, CALL_CMCC, CALL_CUCC, CALL_CTCC, CALL_SHARE_CMCC, CALL_RANK_CMCC, CALL_SHARE_CUCC, CALL_SHARE_CTCC, COMMUNI_CMCC, COMMUNI_CUCC, COMMUNI_CTCC, COMMUNI_SHARE_CMCC, COMMUNI_RANK_CMCC, COMMUNI_SHARE_CUCC, COMMUNI_SHARE_CTCC, G4_CMCC_M, G4_CMCC, G4_RATE, G4_RANK, UMLIMIT_CMCC_M, UNLIMIT_CMCC, UNLIMIT_RATE, UNLIMIT_RANK, UNLIMIT_DIEJIA, ARPU, ARPU_TWO_MONTH, ARPU_MEAN, MOU, MOU_TWO_MONTH, MOU_MEAN, DOU, DOU_TWO_MONTH, DOU_MEAN, VNET, VNET_RATE, CHARGE, CHARGE_RATE, KD_CMCC_M, KD_CMCC, KD_RATE, CONTRACT_CMCC, CONTRACT_PHONE_CMCC, CONTRACT_KD_CMCC, CONTRACT_OTHER_CMCC, CONTRACT_CMCC_TOL, HY_RATE FROM BONC02.RP_SALE_LABEL_M_TOL WHERE STATIS_MONTH = #{statisMonth} AND TYPE = 6

SELECT STATIS_DATE, SCH_AREA_NAME, CNTY_NAME, SCH_ID, SCH_NAME, SCH_PART_ID, SCH_PART_NAME, PACK_HE, PACK_CHANG, PACK_DISTRI_FLOW, PACK_VOICE, PACK_FLOW_SPEED_UP, ACCESS_DISC_FEE, ACCESS_DISC_TICKET, ACCESS_DISC_VOICE, ACCESS_DISC_GROUP, DISC_FEE, DISC_TICKET, DISC_UNLIMIT, TERMI_DISC_HOT, TERMI_DISC_CREDIT, KD_DISC_MULTI, KD_DISC_DIAJIA, KD_DISC_SINGAL, DISC_TAOCAN FROM BONC02.RP_BW_ZD_SALE_LABEL_T3_D where STATIS_DATE = #{statisMonth}

SELECT STATIS_DATE, SCH_AREA_NAME, CNTY_NAME, SCH_ID, SCH_NAME, SCH_PART_ID, SCH_PART_NAME, LEVEL_1_NAME, DISCNT_ID, DISCNT_NAME, ORDER_TODAY, ORDER_MONTH, ORDER_TOTAL FROM BONC02.RP_BW_ZD_SALE_LABEL_T4_D WHERE STATIS_DATE = #{statisMonth}
SELECT STATIS_DATE, SCH_AREA_NAME, CNTY_NAME, SCH_ID, SCH_NAME, SCH_PART_ID, SCH_PART_NAME, pz_usrs, onnet_usrs, onnet_rate FROM BONC02.RP_BW_PAI_ZHAO_TOL_D WHERE STATIS_DATE =#{statisMonth}

select area_name, '' qx_name, sch_id, sch_name, svc_code, arpu, dou, mou, TAOCAN_ID, TAOCAN_NAME, case when IS_4G=1 then '是' else '否' end is_4g, case when IS_VNET=1 then '是' else '否' end IS_VNET, case when IS_KD=1 then '是' else '否' end IS_KD, case when IS_CONTRACT=1 then '存费' when IS_CONTRACT_PHONE=1 then '终端' when IS_CONTRACT_KD=1 then '宽带' when IS_CONTRACT_OTHER=1 then '其他' end CONTRACT_CAT, CONT_PRODUCT_ID, CONT_PRODUCT_NAME, CONT_PACKAGE_ID, CONT_PACKAGE_NAME, CONT_INVAL, ONLINE_MONTH, FEE_DISCNT, DISCNT_YOUHUI_ID, DISCNT_YOUHUI_RANK, DISCNT_ID, DISCNT_NAME from BONC02.RP_SALE_LABEL_M where statis_month=#{statisMonth}

select city_name, '' qx_name, sch_id, sch_name, othr_party, case when other_oprat_typ_id='20' then '联通' when other_oprat_typ_id='21' then '电信' end other_oprat_typ, --运营商 sch_users circle_users from BONC02.MK_SCH_OTH_USER_INFO where statis_month=#{statisMonth}

SELECT STATIS_MONTH ,LL_ZONG ,LL_BUXIAL ,LL_ZONG_ZHU ,ZHU_LL_0 ,ZHU_LL_100M ,ZHU_LL_5G ,ZHU_LL_10G ,ZHU_LL_15G ,ZHU_LL_20G ,ZHU_LL_40G ,ZHU_LL_50G ,LL_ZONG_QINGCHUN ,QC_LL_0 ,QC_LL_100M ,QC_LL_5G ,QC_LL_10G ,QC_LL_15G ,QC_LL_20G ,QC_LL_40G ,QC_LL_50G ,LL_ZONG_DIE ,DIE_LL_0 ,DIE_LL_100M ,DIE_LL_5G ,DIE_LL_10G ,DIE_LL_15G ,DIE_LL_20G ,DIE_LL_40G ,DIE_LL_50G ,LL_ZONG_RIZU ,RIZU_LL_0 ,RIZU_LL_100M ,RIZU_LL_5G ,RIZU_LL_10G ,RIZU_LL_15G ,RIZU_LL_20G ,RIZU_LL_40G ,RIZU_LL_50G ,LL_ZONG_FEIBU ,FEIBU_LL_0 ,FEIBU_LL_100M ,FEIBU_LL_5G ,FEIBU_LL_10G ,FEIBU_LL_15G ,FEIBU_LL_20G ,FEIBU_LL_40G ,FEIBU_LL_50G ,LL_ZONG_HEXING ,LL_ZONG_CHANG_30G ,LL_ZONG_CHANG_40G ,LL_WLAN ,DOU FROM BONC02.MK_SCH_YUEBAO_M WHERE STATIS_MONTH=#{statisMonth}

SELECT STATIS_DATE, 187 SCH_NUM, 178.1 SCH_USER, 44.26 SCH_NEW_USER, 168 SCH_ACTIVE, '主推青春卡资费，通过基本资费+定向流量包方式实现，同时强化校园权益宣传' COMP_INFO, 152 SCH_ASIT_CMCC, 76 SCH_ASIT_CUCC, 108 SCH_ASIT_CTCC, FLOW_RATE, SCH_WLAN, SCH_KD, NUM_QUDAO, NEWNUM, NEWNUM_UNLIMIT, NEWNUM_YOUTH, NEWNUM_PACK, NEWNUM_DPACK, NEWNUM_LIMIT, NEWNUM_AND_PACK, NEWNUM_WLAN_PACK, NUM, NUM_UNLIMIT, NUM_YOUTH, NUM_PACK, NUM_DPACK, NUM_LIMIT, NUM_AND_PACK, NUM_WLAN_PACK, SCH_HB, NUM_HB, NUM_SPCL, NUM_FEIXIN, NUM_KD, NUM_VNET, NUM_WLAN FROM BONC02.RP_SCH_SALES_WEEK where STATIS_DATE =#{statisMonth}

SELECT STATIS_MONTH, CITY_NAME, SCH_ID, SCH_NAME, SCH_PART_ID, SCH_PART_NAME, ALL_NUM, CMCC, ALL_COMPI, CUCC, CTCC, RATE_BENWANG , RATE_COMPI, ALL_NEW_NUM, NEW_CMCC, ALL_NEW_COMPI, NEW_CUCC, NEW_CTCC, RATE_NEW_BENWANG, RATE_NEW_COMPI, ALL_NUM_S, CMCC_S, ALL_COMPI_S, CUCC_S, CTCC_S, RATE_BENWANG_S, RATE_COMPI_S, ALL_NEW_NUM_S, NEW_CMCC_S, NEW_COMPI_S, NEW_CUCC_S, NEW_CTCC_S, RATE_NEW_BENWANG_S, RATE_NEW_COMPI_S FROM RP_SCH_USER_RATE_M WHERE STATIS_MONTH=#{statisMonth}

SELECT STATIS_DATE, CITY_NAME, SCH_ID, SCH_NAME, SCH_PART_ID, SCH_PART_NAME, ALL_NUM, CMCC, ALL_COMPI, CUCC, CTCC, RATE_BENWANG , RATE_COMPI, ALL_NEW_NUM, NEW_CMCC, ALL_NEW_COMPI, NEW_CUCC, NEW_CTCC, RATE_NEW_BENWANG, RATE_NEW_COMPI, ALL_NUM_S, CMCC_S, ALL_COMPI_S, CUCC_S, CTCC_S, RATE_BENWANG_S, RATE_COMPI_S, ALL_NEW_NUM_S, NEW_CMCC_S, NEW_COMPI_S, NEW_CUCC_S, NEW_CTCC_S, RATE_NEW_BENWANG_S, RATE_NEW_COMPI_S FROM RP_SCH_USER_RATE_D WHERE STATIS_DATE=#{statisMonth}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BONC02.MK_SCH_RPT_FILE_CFG (FILE_ID,FILE_NAME, ADDRES, CREATE_TIME) VALUES( #{saveFile.fileId},#{saveFile.fileName}, #{saveFile.addres},#{saveFile.createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_NAME,ADDRES FROM BONC02.MK_SCH_RPT_FILE_CFG where FILE_NAME =#{fileName}
select count(*) FROM BONC02.SCHOOL_HELP_USER WHERE OA_ID=#{oaId}
